com.foreach.across.core.installers

Class AcrossLiquibaseInstaller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.core.installers.AcrossLiquibaseInstaller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AcrossSequencesInstaller

    @InstallerGroup(value="schema")
public abstract class AcrossLiquibaseInstaller
extends Object
    This class is the base for Installers which run liquibase update on installation
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme, Andy Debrouwer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected AcrossLiquibaseInstaller()
      Creates an AcrossLiquibaseInstaller which will use the changelog file which corresponds to this installers full class name to perform the liquibase update
      protected AcrossLiquibaseInstaller(SchemaConfiguration schemaConfiguration)
      Creates an AcrossLiquibaseInstaller which will use the changelog file which corresponds to this installers full class name to perform the liquibase update and will construct the liquibase.changelog.ChangeLogParameters based on the given SchemaConfiguration
      protected AcrossLiquibaseInstaller(String changelog)
      Creates an AcrossLiquibaseInstaller which will use the given changelog file to perform the liquibase update
      protected AcrossLiquibaseInstaller(String changelog, SchemaConfiguration schemaConfiguration)
      Creates an AcrossLiquibaseInstaller which will use the given changelog file to perform the liquibase update and will construct the liquibase.changelog.ChangeLogParameters based on the given SchemaConfiguration

    • Constructor Detail

      • AcrossLiquibaseInstaller

        protected AcrossLiquibaseInstaller()
        Creates an AcrossLiquibaseInstaller which will use the changelog file which corresponds to this installers full class name to perform the liquibase update

        eg if this constructor is used to create an instance of the class my.example.LiquibaseInstaller the changelog file at {resourceRoot}/my/example/LiquibaseInstaller.xml will be used to preform the liquibase update

      • AcrossLiquibaseInstaller

        protected AcrossLiquibaseInstaller(SchemaConfiguration schemaConfiguration)
        Creates an AcrossLiquibaseInstaller which will use the changelog file which corresponds to this installers full class name to perform the liquibase update and will construct the liquibase.changelog.ChangeLogParameters based on the given SchemaConfiguration

        eg if this constructor is used to create an instance of the class my.example.LiquibaseInstaller the changelog file at {resourceRoot}/my/example/LiquibaseInstaller.xml will be used to preform the update

      • AcrossLiquibaseInstaller

        protected AcrossLiquibaseInstaller(String changelog)
        Creates an AcrossLiquibaseInstaller which will use the given changelog file to perform the liquibase update

      • AcrossLiquibaseInstaller

        protected AcrossLiquibaseInstaller(String changelog,
                                   SchemaConfiguration schemaConfiguration)
        Creates an AcrossLiquibaseInstaller which will use the given changelog file to perform the liquibase update and will construct the liquibase.changelog.ChangeLogParameters based on the given SchemaConfiguration

    • Method Detail

      • setSchemaConfiguration

        protected void setSchemaConfiguration(SchemaConfiguration schemaConfiguration)
        Sets the SchemaConfiguration that will be used to construct the liquibase.changelog.ChangeLogParameters

        if no defaultSchema is configured via setDefaultSchema(String) the defaultSchema from SchemaConfiguration.getDefaultSchema() will be used instead

        Parameters:
        schemaConfiguration - the SchemaConfiguration to be set
        See Also:
        SpringLiquibase.setChangeLogParameters(Map)

      • getSchemaConfiguration

        protected SchemaConfiguration getSchemaConfiguration()
        Returns:
        the SchemaConfiguration that will be used to construct the liquibase.changelog.ChangeLogParameters

      • setChangeLog

        public void setChangeLog(String changelog)
        Sets a Spring Resource that is able to resolve to a file or classpath resource. An example might be classpath:db-changelog.xml.
        See Also:
        SpringLiquibase.setChangeLog(String)

      • getChangelog

        protected String getChangelog()
        Returns:
        a Resource that is able to resolve to a file or classpath resource.

      • setDefaultSchema

        protected void setDefaultSchema(String defaultSchema)
        Sets the default Schema that will be used during the liquibase update

        This will override the defaultSchema configured in SchemaConfiguration.getDefaultSchema()

        Parameters:
        defaultSchema - The default db schema name
        See Also:
        SpringLiquibase.setDefaultSchema(String)

      • getDefaultSchema

        protected String getDefaultSchema()
        Returns:
        The db schema name that will be used as default schema during the liquibase update

      • setDataSource

        protected void setDataSource(DataSource dataSource)
        Override the dataSource this installer should use (defaults to the installer datasource otherwise).
        Parameters:
        dataSource - the DataSource instance to be set
        See Also:
        SpringLiquibase.setDataSource(DataSource)

      • getDataSource

        protected DataSource getDataSource()
        Returns:
        The DataSource that liquibase will use to perform the migration.

      • setBeanFactory

        @Autowired
protected void setBeanFactory(org.springframework.beans.factory.config.ConfigurableListableBeanFactory beanFactory)

      • install

        @InstallerMethod
public void install()
                              throws liquibase.exception.LiquibaseException
        This is this AcrossLiquibaseInstallers InstallerMethod

        It will create a SpringLiquibase instance based on this AcrossLiquibaseInstallers configuration and run a liquibase update

        Throws:
        liquibase.exception.LiquibaseException

      • createSpringLiquibase

        protected liquibase.integration.spring.SpringLiquibase createSpringLiquibase()
        This method configures the SpringLiquibase object before running the liquibase installer.

        This implementation will set the SpringLiquibase objects changelogParameters, changelog, default schema and data source based on this AcrossLiquibaseInstaller configuration.

        Extensible if you need to perform some extra configuration on the SpringLiquibase object.

        Returns:
        The configured @link SpringLiquibase} object - before SpringLiquibase.afterPropertiesSet()

      • buildParameters

        protected Map<String,String> buildParameters(SchemaConfiguration schemaConfiguration)
